original_text:
He humbles those who dwell on high,
    he lays the lofty city low;
he levels it to the ground
    and casts it down to the dust.
korean_text: 높은 데에 거주하는 자를 낮추시며 솟은 성을 헐어 땅에 엎으시되 진토에 미치게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: He humbles those who dwell on high
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 높은 곳에 거하는 자들을 낮추시며

sentences.original_text: he lays the lofty city low
he levels it to the ground
and casts it down to the dust
